description: Detects svchost hosting RDP termsvcs communicating with the loopback address Author: Samir Bousseaden. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: RDP over Reverse SSH Tunnel WFP
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:"5156" AND ((source.port:"3389" AND DestAddress:(127.* OR "\:\:1")) OR (DestPort:"3389" AND SourceAddress:(127.* OR "\:\:1"))))
